title: CNBC Daily Open: Regional banks popped — but can the rally last?
description: Regional banks popped after Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the government might guarantee deposits. But banks lost ground again in after-hours trading.

title: Nike holiday quarter beats expectations but inventories weigh on margins
description: Investors have been watching to see if Nike's gross margins improve from its direct-to-consumer channels.

title: GameStop stock soars after retailer posts first quarterly profit in two years
description: GameStop has been in the midst of a turnaround and posted its first quarterly profit for the first time in two years.

title: Finland is the No. 1 happiest country in the world for the sixth year in a row
description: The World Happiness Report released its 2023 ranking of the happiest countries.

title: Bill Gates says OpenAI's GPT is the most important advance in technology since 1980
description: "The whole experience was stunning," Gates wrote. "I knew I had just seen the most important advance in technology since the graphical user interface."

title: Google CEO tells employees that 80,000 of them helped test Bard A.I., warns 'things will go wrong'
description: In a memo to employees Tuesday, Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai wrote, “user feedback is critical to improving the product and the underlying technology."

title: Rapper Bad Bunny sued for $40 million over ex-girlfriend's voice recording
description: The voice recording can be heard on two of Bad Bunny’s hit songs: “Pa Ti” and “Dos Mil 16.”

title: If you had Covid before you were vaccinated, you might have less immunity than you think, study says
description: The study, led by Stanford University researchers, challenges prior studies that suggest a Covid infection enhances a vaccinated individual's immune response.

title: TikTok CEO appeals to U.S. users ahead of House testimony
description: Chew emphasized the large scale of TikTok users, small and medium-sized businesses and its own employees based in the U.S. that rely on the company.

title: The Fed is likely to hike rates by a quarter point but it must also reassure it can contain a banking crisis
description: The Federal Reserve is expected to raise interest rates Wednesday by a quarter point, but it also must reassure markets it can stem a worse banking crisis.

title: Everyone's talking about Credit Suisse's risky bonds. Here's what they are and why they matter
description: AT1 bonds date back to the aftermath of the 2008 financial crisis, when regulators tried to shift risk away from taxpayers.

title: Credit Suisse bondholders prepare lawsuit after contentious $17 billion writedown
description: A number of Credit Suisse bondholders said they are considering legal action after the $17 billion wipeout of the embattled bank's AT1 bonds.

title: Google opens Bard A.I. for testing by users in U.S. and UK
description: After months of chatter about the emerging class of chatbots, Google is opening its generative artificial intelligence platform called Bard to testing.

title: Silicon Valley Bank collapse was 'Lehman moment for technology,' top Goldman Sachs dealmaker says
description: The collapse of Silicon Valley Bank was "a little bit like the Lehman moment for technology," a top Goldman Sachs dealmaker told CNBC.

title: Nothing comes for free: What China hopes to gain in return for helping Russia
description: Analysts are questioning what price China could extract from Russia in return for supporting it during its time of vulnerability.

title: 'A financial banana republic': UBS-Credit Suisse deal puts Switzerland's reputation on the line
description: The demise of banking giant Credit Suisse sent shockwaves through financial markets and appears to have dealt a blow to Switzerland's reputation for stability.

title: Russia and China are being driven together as the chasm with the West deepens
description: The U.S. and Ukraine's allies in Europe fear that China throw its military might behind Russia as its invasion of Ukraine appears to be flagging.

title: Shares of Indonesia's GoTo fall more than 4% as 2022 loss swells to $2.6 billion
description: GoTo posted a wider net loss in 2022 as the firm struggles towards profitability

title: IMF is bullish Sri Lanka's crisis-stricken economy will recover as country gets bailout
description: The South Asian country is grappling with its worst financial crisis in decades and the IMF's decision will allow an immediate disbursement of a $333 million loan over four years.

title: To escape the rat race, this pair cycled 15,000 km along the route from Finland to Singapore
description: Valtteri Heinila and Alvari Poikola cycled for eight months through 21 countries. Heinila spoke to CNBC Travel about the joys and dangers of the trip.

title: Amazon's post-Bezos experiment hasn't gone exactly as planned
description: Andy Jassy's tenure as Amazon CEO has been rocky and isn't getting any easier after the company's latest round of job cuts.

title: Dodge resurrects controversial Challenger SRT Demon for final year of V8 muscle cars
description: The 2023 Dodge Challenger SRT Demon 170 will deliver 1,025 total horsepower, 945 foot-pounds of torque and reach 60 mph from a rolling start in 1.66 seconds.

title: In San Francisco, some people wonder when A.I. will kill us all
description: A sign at the Misalignment Museum apologizes, "Sorry for killing most of humanity." The museum is devoted to artificial general intelligence, or super smart AI.
